title: New: Ifan Dafydd – Celwydd
body: In all the [Youth Lagoon related hype](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19154-new-youth-lagoon-dropla/), you may have missed the return of another mightily talented young musician – **Ifan Dafydd**. New track _Celwydd_, featuring vocals from** Alys Williams**, pushes the boat out yet again in terms of budding electronic producers. A beautiful shambles is perhaps the best way to describe it, never truly settling for a certain style, diving beneath it’s multitude of layers is an immensely rewarding experience.
